_source.text: Across the top of the complex is a rigid 25mm poly pipe sprinkler/mister system, this can help with heat relief in the Summer, (as most people are aware cockatoos like nothing better than a shower in the Summer, none less than the Galahs) the whole complex is set on a complete weldmesh-reinforced concrete slab!
